name: file_comment_deleted
long_desc: The file_comment_deleted event is sent when a file comment is deleted. It is sent to all connected clients for users who can see the file. Clients can use this notification to update comments in real-time for open files. The file property is a file object. Unlike file_comment_added and file_comment_edited the comment property only contains the ID of the deleted comment, not the full comment object.
